```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#!/usr/bin/Rscript

library(pacman)
p_load(tm) #loading the tm package
setwd("~/Dropbox/IMC/Avila") #change this to fit your path to the avila folder
dd = "data/plain_data/"

avila.files = list.files (path = dd)
docs <- c(avila.files)

```

Import data
